quickpick_card_placeholder: Select a card type to add to the landing page:
desc_global_action_card: A card showing the LWC Global Quick Actions defined in the org.
desc_record_list_card: A card showing a list of records.
desc_timed_list_card: A card showing a list of records filtered and sorted by a date/time range.
desc_finished: Finish and generate the landing page.
quickpick_sobject_record_list: Select which sObject you want to display on the Record List.
progress_message_retrieving_sobjects: Retrieving sObjects from your org, please wait...
